page.title: 02Hill of Beath Community Hall
page.content: The community centre in Hill of Beath isn't very big but it is big enough for our small village.I go to the youth club which is held in the centre every Tuesday,Friday and Saturday but every second Saturday there is a disco.In the youth club there are four youth leaders who give us activities and games to play.The two most popular games are table_tennis and pool.On Wednesday evenings there are Scottish Country Dancing classes which quite a few people go to.There are villagers who run the Playscheme for local children,arranging trips during the summer holidays.The councillor for Hill of Beath often holds meetings to discuss community business.
